meanings.sent1: The butterfly will flit from flower to flower in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Birds flit through the trees, searching for food.
meanings.sent3: I tried to catch the flitting firefly, but it was too quick for me.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts would flit from one idea to the next, never staying on one for long.
meanings.sent5: The dancer seemed to flit across the stage, graceful and agile.

meanings.sent1: The flit of the hummingbird's wings was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: A sudden flit caught my attention out of the corner of my eye.
meanings.sent3: The flit of the squirrel as it darted up the tree was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The flit of the fish in the water created ripples on the surface.
meanings.sent5: The flit of the butterfly's wings painted a colorful blur in the air.
